comments.body: On a semi-related note, could we switch to â˜ƒ as our magic char, and reserve $ for class nesting and other java-mimicry?
Would be good to do this yes. We have a to-do list item to rehaul the whole name mangling scheme.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +167,171 @@    final val REIFY_TREECREATOR_PREFIX: N       = "$treecreator"
    final val REIFY_TYPECREATOR_PREFIX: N       = "$typecreator"
    final val LAMBDA_ARG_PREFIX: N              = "$hkArg$"
    final val LAMBDA_ARG_PREFIXhead: Char       = LAMBDA_ARG_PREFIX.head
